content.detailedDescription:
I saw a facebook post by a neighbor who said he saw an unexplained red light in the sky. i then checked my surveillance video which happened to be aimed at that section of sky and found the light he described. while watching the video, i noticed the camera had an unexplained loss of about 30 seconds of time, shortly after, the camera was affected by some kind of electromagnetic disturbance, and after another longer period of missing time, the red light (appearing a dimmed white in the night time infrared video) blinked into view. it lasted a couple seconds and then fainter lights could be seen blinking in and out of view in the surrounding sky. then the main light came back on before the view became "normal."

i found it oddly coincidental that the cameras experienced loss of time, rather than just go black as if the power had gone out, and then the light suddenly appears afterward. this particular camera has been very reliable in its performance. the fact that the event was noticed by someone else (and photographed) several hours before i investigated the video footage tells me that none of these lights and camera behavior were caused by the equipment, but recorded a real event in the sky.
content.summary: Glowing orange light materializes with fainter lights around it.

content.detailedDescription: I dont know what it is... i was filming a video and at was verry dark for filming. for that i shoot some photos for check my light-situation and find that little thing over the roof of the hotel.
content.summary: Videoshooting

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was outside in the backyard just speaking with my friend on my phone
2. i was just looking to the sky and i noticed that at first 4 objects were veery far away like a star..But they moved quicly in one direction.
3. i was thinking, it was just a star until i noticed this object was moving.
4. it was not blinking like a plane.. it was very white and bright but in the same time far away , like a star...I saw 12 of those objects, maybe you can explain me , what i hae saw...As i noticed i wanted to take a picture..But the iphone 6 camera wasnt so good to find the light of any of 12 objects. it was cloudy on this day , so maybe there were more then 12 objects. 
5. i was curious
6. as i already said it was cloudy, after 10 minuts they were dissapeared on cloudy sky.
content.summary: Description down below

content.detailedDescription: A buddy and i were riding bikes in a wooded area near my friends home. we were most likely in second or third grade. the trails opened up to a long procession of city power lines.  not far above the lines my friend and i both witnessed a circular outline of something very large. however we could see through the object.  it moved very slowly from our left to right and made no sound.  maybe a hum but that may have been the power lines. it was a bright, golden circle with a second circle in the center of it.  we both were horrified and rode about a mile back to his house where our parents were visiting each other.  they immediately separated us and had us draw and describe what we had seen.  i never saw his drawing but both parents say we drew the exact same thing.  my parents always claimed it was a reflection of some type.  to this day i do not believe it was a reflection, because it was a crystal clear, warm day.
content.summary: Transparent ufo with golden outline

content.detailedDescription:
On december 17, 2017, in texas, traveling as a passenger in a car from lubbock towards post on hwy. 84 e, i spotted an object in the sky quickly moving west. 
at first i thought what i saw was a shooting star with a prominent, defined tracer streaming behind it...But the entire thing disappeared instantly, streamer and all, just to re-appear along the same path of travel, tracer following behind. the yellow-white object did this a total of 3 times before the object was no longer in my field of sight, blocked by the car roof. i could never see it again along the same path, though i did continue checking out the rear of the car where the object logically would have eventually moved to on the path. i could not tell how high exactly it was above us, but it resembled a large star. there were many people travelling on the highway at the same time, so hopefully other witnesses will report the event as well. it happened very quickly and i was unable to get any footage.
content.summary: Ball of light with tracer disappearing and reappearing

content.detailedDescription: We had just came in from a christmas funtion. my 15 year old had left her earbuds at the swing in the back yard and went to get them. she came in excited and told us there was a shooting star and insisted we come look. i told her it had to be gone already and she replied i'm looking at it right now it stopped. i went into the back yard and saw an orange round ball colored like a distant campfire. it was overcast and this thing was under the cloud level. it was bright but not enough to hurt your eyes. it was silent and mildly pulsating. it was about 500 feet away just under cloud level 500 feet high or so.  i initially thought it was a chinese lantern but it was a huge one. it continued to move off after about a minute. it had stopped in plain sight and had been there long enough that i became very aware that it was not normal. after it had moved out about a half mile or so the second one came into sight following the same trajectory but closer to our location. it didn't stop but i could see more detail on it. the first one seemed to wait on it as it had stopped and the second one went to it. then the third one following the same trajectory but was nearly over head of us at 500 ft or less came over and i could see extreme detail. it was a sphere with a smaller sphere inside of it at about the 7 or 8 o'clock position and a third the size of the outer sphere. there was a soft orange haze around it- it was dead quiet. there was trailing behind it but wasn't much and it was in the same color of orange. it looked like shinning a light through an egg and being able to see the shell,white and yolk. the other two had ascended and were barely visible and when the last one got almost to them they all 3  continued to gather and disappeared from sight. i videod over 5 minutes of the sighting but it's no comparison to how it looked in person.
content.summary: My kid thought was a shooting star and had me to come look and we observed 2 more @ 9pm for 6 mins have 5 min video was witnessed by wife and other daughter also

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking home from work october i was 17 almost 18 at the end of my road there is a baseball field. there is a very long stone wall and a big clear opening. as i reached it i looked up and saw a hudge light in the sky. iot had a corona around it. i watched in awe as i have read many books on the subject bud hopkins, ivan sanderson etc. about 5 min watching this thing that was not as high as the clouds but not as low as the trees it shrunk to the size of a star. a small little light. mind you this thing was so big n bright and stationary with no sound whatsoever for about 5 min. all of a sudden the most horrible scared feeling i ever had came over me for no reason. the thing started going right. i ran across the street crying and yelling for the people to let me in. i told them look out your window look and we all did. the thing was going to the right! by then it looked like a plane so they didn’t see what i did. there is a power station next to the ball field.    thanks
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw big brute object in ske aboveboard baseball field. watched for 5 min it shrunk to star size went to left when at neiboring house was going right.

content.detailedDescription:
"1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
2. what made you first notice the object?
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
6. how did you lose sight of the object?"

(sry for bad english)

1.I was going from our sporthall back to school (while going over the bridge)
2.I saw it on 30° up to 40° up, in my canthus so i looked quickly on the object to see what it is
3.F**k it will fall into the bridge!!!
4.The objekt looked like an flying wing, like an boomerang 25meters or 82foots
wide on the back id had an engine how it looks like it was a verry strong engine. the flight of the object while i looked at it was strange because it looked i will fall into the bridge (i was scared because i was on this bridge) but it fast change the direction at ley on the left and turned.
the engine didnt made a sound or something like this and i didnt felt a wind of 
it it was definitely strange.
5. i was scared while the first 3 seconds than i was shocked that a plane or something like this can turn so fast, after this:
6. it was going to be translucent and a few milliseconds later it was invisible
content.summary: An flying wing with an jet-engine (didn´t do a sound)

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room, in wanted to go to bed. suddenly i saw something glowing outside my window. i first tought it was some kind of helicopter or plane, but normaly they are not that bright, green and the object was pretty low above the ground. first the object was hovering than it  started to fly away and after a second it disapeard
content.summary: Right befor i get to bed, i saw something glowing outside my window

content.detailedDescription:
Okay so as i went to go outside for a smoke, it was maybe a half hour before dark, i see this object in the sky and begin to get really excited, i've watched the skies for a long time, and have captured footage of chem trails and stealth technology being used, (believe it or not i have footage)... im just an amateur i do not own anything but a range finder scope and my mobile phone which i have captured the last couple of weird sights in the skies. but this one here really has me blown away.

i noticed first off the size of the object in the sky it did not change, it was very... very slow usually the planes i see leave huge trails and are easy to distinguish between a plane and whatever this objsect was in the sky, 
it was almost glowing and changing shape but stayed the cigar like shape, it was so weird, it came in from the left heading north west almost bobbing along, i have added some light filters to the stills i took to try gather a shape of the object and it's density. this truly is mind blowing its looks exactly like the object seen in space,the dead space ship or cigar shaped comet,

this truly was an event that took place here in england. newcastle, october 22 2017 17.53

the negative picture does it for me that is not a plane and is definitely a solid object thankyou
content.summary: Not a plane for sure!, most definitely something i have never seen,

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was at the toilet when i heard a strange sound like in movies or something. i opened the window and saw that object in the sky not that far away and it was huge. first it looked like a jet but then i realized that it was not so i took my binoculars and observed the object. it was a big object with the shape of a mix of spear and a triangle. it had wings like a jet but it was different. at the back of the wings there were things that looked like propulsion but they were white and didn't look like they used fire. it looked like they had multiple windows and at the windows there were entities that looked like a mix of human and something other. because of the distance and darkness because it was late, i couldn't see the color of their skin but they had strange head shapes, everyone was different. they had something like our hairs but not hairs and that was like long hair. the ufo had black and dark red dash patterns. 
the sound it made was like a mixture of the batmobile and a jet 
after about one minute and 30 seconds, the ufo started to move like a space shuttle in movies and flied away and up to the sky until i couldn't see it anymore. during that, it got louder. the propulsions could move a bit so the "space shuttle" could fly up and it was very fast.
content.summary: It was hovering and then with cool sound flied away and out of our atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: J'ã©tais tranquillement dans ma chambre et je me suis dis pourquoi pas observã© le ciel avec des jumelles en cherchant des ovnis. quant j'ai commencã© ã  regardã© au bout de 20 minutes, je suivais un avion de ligne, quant j'ai commencã© ã  suivre son chemin trail, j'ai observer qu'il y avait un objet en forme de ballons de rubgy ã  peu pret. je pouvais distinguã© de peu qu'il tournais sur lui meme en stationnaire. j'ai regardã© le soleil de quelles direction il ã©tais pour voir comment refletais les rayon du soleil dessus. le cotã© droit reflaitais bien comme si c'ã©tais du mã©tal par rapport au rayon du soleil. d'une couleur comme le mercure. puis ã  se moment l'objet parti vite dans une direction que je n'ai pas pue voir tellement c'est aller vite
content.summary: Objets couleur mercure suivant un chemin trail

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog on a very clear night when i looked up like i often do and saw a star that appeared to be moving. when i looked out there appeared to be a pinkish star traveling at speeds i never knew could be obtained. it made  the sharpest turns almost at right angles and at first i thought it was a drone, but when a jetliner cross paths and blocked the object out i knew it was way too high to be anything like that. i watched it for 15 minutes until it was like somebody flipped a switch and it was gone
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: High altitude above cruising height of a jet that was observed

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a car, behind the driver, i watched the forest by the autobahn. suddenly i saw an object levitating, staying for like 7 seconds, and descend into the forest again. it was evening and a little bit dark. it was summer.
it had a torso, a small coupled head a torso and 6 to 8 tentacles or arms. it was dark grey or black.
i was like 13 or 14 and i was confused and amazed. i didn't say anything to my parents  because i thought they would think i was crazy.
a small moment, but i still remember after 4 years or so.
content.summary: Object flying high, stay for 7 sec, descend into forest

content.detailedDescription: Noticed object after scrolling through my pictures that day.

content.detailedDescription: The craft is out now. 1:19 am.

content.detailedDescription:
we were at the jw marriott for thanksgiving 2017 after dinner  we were out on the balcony and it appeared over the animal reserve.   the object went up down sideways stopped change colors from red to orange to yellow to silver to green to blue for over 2 1/2 minutes. 
 you can tell from the still shots from the video it changed from spear to a triangle with lights around it then went up and down and change to bluish green and then disappeared
content.summary: The object change colors from orange red green silver and more shapes for over 2 1/2 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was at the corner of nursery and keene in clearwater fl at a stoplight and was going to take a photo of a house on the corner with xmas lights when i saw this bright light just hoovering behind the redlight so i took a photo of it but was not a good one and i knew i needed more or better ones so when i started driving again i took 3 more photos from the driver seat of my car there was no place to pull off and get out and take a photo's. so i kept driving taking 3 more and it was just hovering there with no sound but looked like it was coming out of a hole in the sky like something opened the sky up and it came out of it. it did change shapes from like a straight body u shape to oval coming out of this hole. then when it finally got all the way out there was this weird vibration do not know how to explain it but that. the cars electrical system went haywire for about 20 seconds i got scared and floored it. there was other cars on the road looking at this and some turning around to get away and some like me just getting the hell out of there. if you blow up the photos you can see it coming out of this hole and changing shape.No clue what this was. the first photo if you look under the red light on the right thats when i saw it the other 3 are when i was driving towards it but put it in photo editor you will see this hole or whatever it is . unreal!
content.summary: Something came out of a holein the sky changed shaped

content.detailedDescription:
When i was a little boy
i stayed at home one day

and i decided to try to give some water to my dead plant
when i claimed up and taped the water i notice for something that i dont know about
it was something with unknown fleeing
so i mange to hold the object and then i saw

it was a rubber that i can stretch and cant find the limit
and yer it was sleepy  and was feeling as not from what i know

i try to cut it with a knife and i fail

content.detailedDescription: I have 4dogs living with my wife and myself,.My german shepard captain who will be 2 in april is a very smart dog..Also very protective of me and my family.. nothing gets around my house (we have 3and a half acres)..My wife had gone to bed and i was up late watching a movie. the dogs were lying around me sleeping..Captain sat up and it looked to me like he heard something..We have a lot of deers around where we live and i assumed that's what he heard.I got up to let him out..I put him on leash and took him out..Usually he will pull and tug at the leash but this time was different..He stood in the driveway and turned his head at an angle like he does when he hears police sirens but i heard nothing...That's when every hair on my body raised up..Goose bumps on my arms..And on captain..The hair rose up on the center of his back from his neck to his tail..Like it does when he's about to attack..Which i have taught him..When he looked up over his shoulder so did i..Moving just above the tree tops was a disk for better words,twice the size of my house in diameter..It was lighter than the sky but the light was very dull..Moving about as fast as someone jogging..I watched it pass almost directly over my house.. slightly to the left of my garage as i was standing in front of..I knew i was looking at something that could not be doing what it was doing..It made no sound..But i felt scared me..As it passed over me i could feel something crawling over me like something scratching my skin..All i could do was watch it pass over me and out of sight..When i could no longer see it i just stood there..I looked down at captain and he was cowering at my feet like as if i had yelled at him..I yanked his collar and he got up and started this crazy barking..Along with other dogs in the neighborhood..Even the other three dogs in the house..I went in side and was going to wake my wife but met her at the door..She was crying because she said she had this really bad headache and it woke her up and she couldn't find me..I told her what i had seen and she just brushed it off..Went on line looking for recent sightings and found you guys so that my story.
content.summary: Observed large circular object above my head after feeling hairs standing up over my body

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was inside my house.
2. i went outide on the deck and noticed a bright 
light in the sky which was moving up and down in a strange way.
3.At first i thought it was a bright star but it 
was changing color (blue, green, red, & yellow).
4.It was silently pulsating and appeared to change its shape.I took more than 20 photos with my lenovo phab 2 mobile phone in hdr zoomed x4. the shape and colour of the ufo clearly changed as confirmed in the photos (half of which were taken only seconds apart). it moved up and down, left and right, hovered silently. definitely not an airplane, helicopter, insect, or problem with my camera!
5.I was in awe, particularly after my camera confirmed what i was actually seeing was real. this experience confirmed what i've felt all along. that is, we are not alone.
6. i lost sight of the ufo approximately 2.5 hours later. it was freezing cold outside and when clouds came in i couldn't see it any longer.
note:the ufo was very far away in the night sky and only appears as a small light moving strangely and emitting colours. i have resized many of the photos in order to see the object better. i find the large picture of the square box ufo with something on the top resembling a medieval cross quite eerie.
content.summary: Ufo in night sky over quedlinburg, germany. appeared to change its shape, size, & color many times.

content.detailedDescription:
Alleged / reported reptilian aliens have been mind controlling father's mind since at least january 2014 and sister's mind from an unknown date.  their apparent mission seems to have in part, focused on the use of human bodies to experience this dimension along with the forcible confinement of mother rendered sick and disabled by this alien intrusion / manipulation.

these regressive alien intruders appear to be supported by a network of human-looking operatives among the police and judiciary who have been mysteriously blocking son's access to disabled mother.

the alien intruders appear to be engaged in some kind of experiments against the mother for more than two years, and have relied on a network of operatives to reinforce their agenda.

this regressive alien activity may be part of other such activities against humans involving mind control and abduction which poses a vital threat to our human sovereignty including rights and freedoms on our planet earth.
content.summary: Apparent alien abduction / mind-control of father's and sister's minds - mother kidnapped

content.detailedDescription:
These pictures are from a game camera in the field i hunt on block island
the camera is both heat and motion activated so when a heat source or an object is very close it tends to
washout the picture in an extreme it will cause a white screen
look at this pics in time order. 
the first picture the camera takes is a partial white out.  the 2nd pic is totally 
whited out.  the third shows a glowing object about 50 to 70 yards down the  field.
the last pic is of something flying away! this all takes place in 4 seconds
content.summary: First picture the camera takes is a partial white out 2nd pic total whiteout 3 object on ground 4 object in air

content.detailedDescription: This sighting is more than 18 years ago. i was pregnant of my first child, me and my late husband were visiting his parents on their ship, which was ankered on the riverside. it was a beautiful sunny day with a clear blue sky. it must have been may or june, they were prepairing the ship for the summer hollidays. it was in the afternoon. we were on the deck of the ship. my husband spotted a small silvery object high in the sky which was just sitting still. he told me and his father. we could see it too, although it was very small. because it was so high up, he went into the hut to get the binoculars. he was convinced it was a ufo. when i took a look through the binoculars i could see a small disk shaped object (silver and white with possibly a dome on top) sitting still in the sky of the town on the other side of the river. i did not know what it was but it looked like a ufo but it was so far away that i could not see it very well. i felt a strange sort of fear. my father in law saw the object too, but he is a very rational man, and directly started to declare that it was a airplane. we objected to that because we could not see any wings and it was disk-shaped. we got into a discussion about it whith him. he did not want to have a closer look through the binoculars. my mother law distracted me and took me inside of the hut. when i came back on deck the object was gone.
content.summary: disc hovering above town

content.detailedDescription: Two objects in pairs appeared wjen taking pictures. at 04:40:31 pm puerto rico time. there were more but this is the best i got during the trip.
content.summary: Two objects in pairs appeared wjen taking pictures.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from manhattan kansas when i noticed that the left side of my window was full of stars and the right side was a completely clear sky. i looked up to my right and saw two star like balls of light that were pulsing and hovering in a general vacinity up in the sky. i saw the balls of light had color but i couldn’t tell what color, due to the distance, the colors were blurred together. a few seconds later the ball of light on the right takes off in a rainbow curved shape followed by a red over blue streak of light. there is a flash of light and the ball was gone leaving only one floating ball of light in the sky. at that point i thought it was a bomb and was waiting for an explosion. when none came i looked harder at the ball of light, it just continued to hover and pulse in the same spot. eventually it faded with my drive, but each time i went to look for it i always ended up finding it sitting there watching me. during this whole experience i was getting flashes of someone telling me a story of the “collected” and explaining to me how we will soon become a part of that group. i have an idea for a book based on the story i was told during my experience.
content.summary: Twin star-like balls of lights in sky.  left side of sky full of stars, right completely clear. light on right takes off in rainbow shape red and blue light beam
